Famous Temples of India

Temple Locations

List of Famous Temples in India

No. Temple Name Location Description
1 Vaishno Devi Jammu Sacred Hindu temple in Trikuta Mountains.
2 Golden Temple Punjab Holiest Sikh shrine with golden dome.
3 Somnath Temple Gujarat First among twelve Jyotirlinga Shiva shrines.
4 Siddhivinayak Maharashtra Famous Mumbai temple for Lord Ganesha.
5 Sri Sridi Sai Baba Mandir Sikkim Peaceful shrine dedicated to Sai Baba.
6 Venkateshwara Tirupati Balaji Andhra Pradesh World's richest temple of Lord Venkateswara.
7 Ramanathaswamy Temple Tamil Nadu Famous for its long sacred corridors.
8 Jagannath Temple Odisha Known for grand annual Rath Yatra.
9 Mahabodhi Bihar Where Buddha attained enlightenment under tree.
10 Kashi Vishwanath Uttar Pradesh Iconic Shiva temple on Ganges banks.
11 Kamakhya Assam Important Shakti Peetha for Goddess Kamakhya.
